Features.Panning.SecondsPerLayer.Descrip: The time, in seconds, it takes to pan one layer of material.
Features.Panning.DropsPerLayer.Descripti: The number of drops spawned per layer of material.
Features.Panning.SaturationPerLayer.Desc: The saturation lost when panning a single layer of material.
Provides an easier way for players to pan resources.
Features.Panning.ModMenu.lblSecondsPerLa: Determines the number of seconds per layer when panning
Features.Panning.ModMenu.lblDropsPerLaye: Determines the number of drops per layer when panning
Features.Panning.ModMenu.lblSaturationPe: Determines the saturation per layer when panning
